Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible deal while maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
